#summary For those who want to install and play with xproc.xq
#labels xproc

=  Installation =

Download latest release zip [http://code.google.com/p/xprocxq/downloads/list here], which requires latest trunk version of [http://exist.sourceforge.net eXist XML Database].

The current definition of how to use and install is contained in the source code [http://xprocxq.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/main/README.eXist README.eXist] document.

View all releases from the Downloads tab [http://code.google.com/p/xprocxq/downloads/list?can=1&q=&colspec=Filename+Summary+Uploaded+Size+DownloadCount here].

= Release Distro =

The release distribution consists zip package containing the following:

  README.eXist   - This document

  VERSION        - A summary of the distribution version

  LICENSE        - Included licenses notice
  
  ChangeLog      - Generated svn changelog

  xprocxq.jar    - xprocxq application

  expath.jar     - expath module deps        

  test/examples  - XProc tests and test.xq for testing with eXist XML Database



= Source Distro=

Get source code via subversion check out from [http://code.google.com/p/xprocxq/source subversion].

The source distribution consists of:
   
  README      - This document

  VERSION     - A summary of the distribution version

  RELEASE     - Current release version    

  LICENSE     - Included licenses notice

  LOC         - lines of code metric    

  ChangeLog   - Generated svn changelog

  build.xml   - Apache Ant build file For generating release dist

  bin/        - Xproc run script

  etc/        - Misc artifacts

  lib/        - 3rd party deps, this directory is empty for the time being

  test/       - XProc Unit Tests

  src/        - XQuery source files


To build a release from source, run the supplied Apache Ant build.xml file with dist target

> ant dist
